title: Microcosmic Tales: 100 Wondrous Science Fiction Short-Short Stories
description: A collection of one hundred short science fiction tales features the work of such sci-fi masters as Arthur C. Clarke, Larry Niven, Fritz Leiber, Robert Silverberg, Fredric Brown, Harlan Ellison, Lester del Rey, and Isaac Asimov. Original.
author: Isaac Asimov
